title: RestManager.addManagedResource returns null instead of newly created instance
description: This seems unintended, or if it's intended shall we clarify the javadocs w.r.t. when null/non-null is returned?

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: Steve Rowe and/or Timothy Potter - would you have any thoughts on this patch/ticket? Thanks.

[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=1b809e7 ]

SOLR-9134: Fix RestManager.addManagedResource return value.

comments.content: Christine, if you want to push to branch_6_0, I think it's okay to include this in the 6.0.1 RC, which I've been unsuccessfully trying to make today.

comments.content: Timothy Potter - thanks for the review. Steve Rowe - good idea, I will push to branch_6_0 shortly.

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: branch_6_0 push done. As far as the solr/CHANGES.txt entries on master and branch_6x go, should I be relocating the entry from the 6.1 to the 6.0.1. section now or would that happen as part of the 6.0.1 RC process?

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content:
Thanks Christine.  

I'll take care of moving CHANGES.txt entries for this issue on branch_6x and master (along with all other backported issues), after the 6.0.1 release vote passes.

comments.author: Steve Rowe
comments.content: Bulk close issues included in the 6.0.1 release.
